# Supplementary Tables {#SITable}

## Comparsion matrix of web portal tools
```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
df <- read.csv("S1.csv")
df %>%
  kbl(caption = "Comparsion matrix of web portal tools") %>%
  kable_classic(full_width = F, html_font = "Cambria") %>%
  scroll_box(width = "100%")
```
Note: The criteria for query search and data analysis explorer please see Table S2 and S3.
